title: ayyA yAnoru
sahitya:
ayyA nAnoru vIra sanyAsi en aruT-pashi tIrAyO mukham pArAyO


anupallavi

  tuyyA ponnambalam vAzh duraiyE un vAsalil tuTTukkapparai taTTi varavillai


caraNam 1    annak-kAvaDiyillai ANDi maThamillai azhagAna maDat-tAikkum Ashai paDuvadillai
mannuyirk-kulamellAm unnaruT-kulamAkka vallamai vENDinEn tillaiyin vaLLalE
    caraNam 2   kAsu paNangaLai vIsi erindu vandEn kAlamellAm shivakAmam onrE endAi
mAsaTra nin podu manrilil onriyE manbadai vAzhttiDum anbadai nalguvAi
